MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Rhiw, Aberdaron and surrounding area.  Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficult weather conditions on site and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10PM on 19th February 2021.
